parameters.name: DataSourceType
parameters.description:
Type of Hadoop external table to be enabled, with values:

- HDFS 

- Hive

parameters.name: EmrInstanceId
parameters.description: When HadoopCreateType=Emr, this field should contain the EMR instance ID.

parameters.name: HDFSConf
parameters.description: Content string of the Hadoop hdfs-site.xml file. This field is required when enabling an HDFS external table.

parameters.name: HadoopCoreConf
parameters.description: Content string of the Hadoop core-site.xml file.

parameters.name: HadoopCreateType
parameters.description:
External service type:

- emr

- hadoop: Self-built Hadoop

parameters.name: HadoopHostsAddress
parameters.description: Address and hostname of the Hadoop cluster's source node in the /etc/hosts file.

parameters.name: HiveConf
parameters.description: Content string of the Hadoop hive-site.xml file. This field is required when enabling a HIVE external table.

parameters.name: MapReduceConf
parameters.description: Content string of the Hadoop mapred-site.xml file. This field is required when enabling an HDFS external table.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
Region ID.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) interface to view available region IDs.

parameters.name: YarnConf
parameters.description: Content string of the Hadoop yarn-site.xml file. This field is required when enabling an HDFS external table.
